import React, { Component } from "react"; import moment from 'moment'; import "./filter.css"; class Filter extends Component { state = { category : 'No category', length : 'any', year : 0, }; //sending our filters up to app.js handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: [event.target.value] }, () => this.props.updateFilters(this.state.category.toString(), this.state.length, this.state.year) ); }; render() { return (
{"Filters"}
); } } export default Filter;
